Lash and brow bar

Lash and Brow Bar

  • Brow tinting $25

    Let’s give those brows some color! Come see us for your eyebrow tint.

  • Brow tinting, shaping & clean up $50

    Get it all done at once! Let’s tint and wax your brows to look their best.

Book now

Henna Brows

Henna Brows is a natural tint. It is a form of eyebrow tinting where the skin beneath the brow hair is stained using henna. It creates an illusion of depth and fullness to the brows and helps in filling the gaps. Henna brows are semi-permanent and last longer than a normal tint.

If you like the look of defined and bold, then Henna Tint is for you

  • Henna brows, shaping & clean up $70

    60 mins

Book now

Brow Lamination & Shaping

  • Brow lamination & shaping $70

    60 mins

Eyebrow lamination is the hottest new trend that’s catching up right now. And we’re all set to give you the best brow lamination

  • Henna Brow, Lamination & shaping $100

    75 mins

A Combination of Henna Brow & brow lamination service will give you the shape and definition you’ve always wanted. Say goodbye to unruly brows and hello to beautiful, polished brows in minutes.

Book now

Lash Lift

Lash lifting is a semi permanent lift & curl that works with your natural lashes. A perfect alternative to lash extensions if you don’t want the maintenance

  • Lash Lift $80

    60 mins

Book now

Lash Tinting

A little tint goes a long way… Imagine waking up and never having to put on that coat of mascara, instead a frame of bold, dark and beautiful lashes frames your eyes.

  • Lash Tinting $30

    30 mins

Book now

Lash Lift & Tinting

Same as a lash lift, but with the add-on of a tint for extra mascara effect

  • Lash Lift & Tinting $100

    75 mins

Book now

Aftercare

• Keep them dry for 24 hours as this can make the tint fade much quicker

• Avoid applying brow make-up for at least 24 hours

• Avoid using any oil-based makeup remover
